astronomy.name: apod
astronomy.desc: View an astronomical image of any given in a day provided by NASA
astronomy.note:
If you don't provide a date, the default date will be date.
Input date must be after 16/06/1995

ftelling.name: tarot
ftelling.desc: Pick a random card from Rider Waite Tarot and give meaning!
ftelling.note: Type letter `r` to add the reverse cards, `nr` to not to use reverse cards. Type `1` (one card), `3` (three cards), `5` (five cards) or `c` (Celtic Cross) to choose the spread.

ftelling.name: numerology
ftelling.desc: See the meaning of The Ruling Number of a birth!

ftelling.name: zodiac
ftelling.desc: Give zodiac information about any date!

ftelling.name: lichvannien
ftelling.desc: See Vietnamese "Van Nien calendar" using Gregorius/Lunar calendar.
ftelling.note: The date must be entered. Use `<a>` option to type Lunar date and `<d>` option to type Gregorius date. Lunar date converted using Vietnam timezone (GMT+7).

random.name: dice
random.syntax: [number of faces in first dice] [number of faces in second dice] ... [number of faces in nth dice]
random.note: If you don't provide any faces of any dice, default will be a dice has 6 faces.

random.name: password
random.note: Length must be an integer greater than and equal to 8 and less than and equal to 100

random.name: pick
random.desc: Choose an option from a list

random.name: rand
random.desc: Choose a random number in range
random.note:
If you don't provide any arguments, default range will be [1, 100].
If you only provided one argument, the range will be [1, argument you provided].

random.name: rdate
random.desc: Give a random date in range
random.note:
If you don't provide any arguments, default will be after 01/01/1970.
If you only provided one argument, the range will be after 01/01/1970 and before the date you provided.

random.name: remoji
random.desc: Give a random emoji from a random server which bot is joined!

random.name: rtime
random.desc: Give a random time in range
random.note:
If you don't provide any arguments, default will be after 00: 00 and before 23: 59.
If you only provided one argument, the range will be after 00: 00 and before the time you provided.

setting.name: prefix
setting.desc: Update the prefix of the bot at the server
setting.note:
You need Administrator or Manager Server permission.
Prefix's length must be a positive number and less than 32.
New prefix must be provided

setting.name: language
setting.desc: Update the language of the bot at the server
setting.note: You need Administrator or Manager Server permission.

setting.name: selflanguage
setting.desc: Update the language of the bot for you
setting.note: Language preference: Your language → Server language → Default language (`vi`)

setting.name: disable
setting.desc: Disable commands/group commands at the current channel
setting.note: If use `all`, all the commands except `enable` cannot be used at the current channel!

setting.name: enable
setting.desc: Enable commands/group commands at the current channel
setting.note: If use `all`, all the commands can be used at the current channel!

setting.name: tarotdefault
setting.desc: Use reverse Tarot card by default
setting.note: Type `true` to use reverse Tarot card by default.

utility.name: avatar
utility.note: If you do not enter another person, the default will take your avatar!

utility.name: changelog
utility.note:
If use `lists`, it will return a list of all versions
If you provide the name of the version, it will be details of that version
If you don't provide any arguments, default will be the latest version.

utility.name: color
utility.note: If no information is entered, the default will give any color.

utility.name: help
utility.desc: Gives a list of command groups, commands and details of each command.
utility.note: If nothing is entered, all commands and groups of commands will be displayed by default.

utility.name: qrgen
utility.note: String's length must be a positive number and less than 1600!

utility.name: whois
utility.desc: Get info of any users at executed server!
utility.note: If you don't provide any arguments, default will be your info!
